QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Chapped lips
QAPair.Answer: Here are some recommendations for preventing chapped lips: Avoid excessive sun exposure., Avoid going out in dry, cold weather without putting on lip balm or lipstick., Try to keep the air in your home humid., Use a sunscreen on your lips when outside in sunny weather. , Here are some recommendations for soothing chapped and sore lips: Drink additional fluids in winter months., Treat chapped lips with beeswax or petrolatum (for example, Vaseline or other lip balm). , See your health care provider if you have sores that will not heal on your lips.
